summary: A young man struggles with his desire to study art when his family thinks he's headed for premed studies. Conflicts between Filipino traditions and expectations vs. personal dreams in the contemporary world erupt at his sister's debut.
cast: Dante Basco|Jayson Schaal|Brian Card|Mindy Spence|Nicole Hawkyard|Brandon Martinez|Ernie Zarate|Gina Alajar|Emelita Moll|Gina Honda|Tirso Cruz III|Bernadette Balagtas|Rawlins Apilado|Derek Basco|Joy Bisco|Luis Gonzales|Robbie Pagatpatan|Emmanuel Coquia|Isaiah Dacio|Abe Pagtama|Fe de los Reyes|Rowland Kerr|Darion Basco|Dionysio Basco|Conrad Cimarra|Eddie Garcia|Blas Lorenzo|Alisha Floresca|GiGi Floresca|Leslye Maninang|Arianna Basco|Hyacinth Nier|Jay Tapaoan|Patrick Gealogo|Reno Ursal
keywords: based on short film|party|birthday party|high school|thug
title: El debut
